title: Grey Warwick
body:
Heya team, does anyone know anything more about the availability of the grey {{champion:19}} Warwick skin? Although Rito didn't bring him back with the other legacy skins (Big Bag/Feral WW) I recall hearing something vague about bringing him back under special circumstances. 

I have been having a lot of fun with WW (just got level 7 mastery!) and although I do like the tundra hunter skin, I reckon being able to get (what I believe to be) the best skin would be super cool!


Thanks!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Grey WW isnt obtainable at all unfortunately, he was only able to get from the recruit a friend system, waaaayyyy back, when it was removed the skin became unavailable and will remain that way until Riot implement it back into the game

Sorry bud
Yeah, I thought that might be the case. For some reason I thought I heard the grey WW could come back, but not URF WW. Wishful thinking probably . xD
Nothing I've heard of but I'm sure you can still obtain grey warwick through hextech crafting if your lucky.
